text: I disregard and violate the rights of others without feeling remorse.
I feel like rules were never meant for me and I can break them without consequences.
I lie, deceive, or manipulate others for personal gain or pleasure.
I feel like people annoy me and I have little patience for others' needs or feelings.
I act impulsively without considering the consequences for myself or others.
I have a history of aggressive or violent behavior toward others or animals.
I show a consistent lack of remorse for hurting others or causing harm.
I feel indifferent to the suffering of others and don't feel empathy.
I engage in illegal activities or behaviors that could harm others.
I feel like I'm above the law and don't need to follow social norms or rules.
I respect others' rights and boundaries and feel empathy for their experiences.
I follow rules and social norms because I understand their importance for society.
I feel genuine remorse when I hurt others or cause harm.
I can control my impulses and consider consequences before acting.
I value honesty and integrity in my interactions with others.
I feel like I can get away with anything and don't need to face consequences.
I enjoy manipulating or deceiving others for my own benefit.
I have difficulty maintaining relationships because I don't care about others' feelings.
I feel like I'm entitled to take what I want without considering others.
I can work cooperatively with others and respect their boundaries and needs.
